text: ninre occavekkalilute avarilninn ninakk kaliyavunnavareyeakke ni terriccukealluka. avarkketire ni ninre kutirappatayeyum kalalppatayeyum orumiccukuttuka. sampattilum santanannalilum avareateappam kuttucernnukealluka. avarkk ni meahana vagdanannal nalkukayum ceyyuka.” pisacinre avareatulla vagdanam keatum catiyallateannumalla
